Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents a player in the game. It manages the player's state, hand, score, and other game-related attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(PawnColor pawnColor, String username, Board board)
      Constructor for the Player class. It initializes the player's state, hand, score, and other attributes.
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - the color of the player's pawn.
      username - the username of the player.
      board - the game board.

  • Method Details

    • addToHand

      private void addToHand(Deck<PlayableCard> deck, Deck<PlayableCard> substituteDeck, int index) throws IllegalStateOperationException
      Method add the selected card to the player hand Notice that the logic of this class is specified in the states and the method is called by the six public drawing methods. Here are written the exceptions messages
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck to draw from.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException

    • drawGold

      public boolean drawGold(int index) throws EmptyDeckException, IllegalStateOperationException
      Draws a gold card directly from the goldDeck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - if the deck is empty.
      IllegalStateOperationException

    • drawResource

      public boolean drawResource(int index) throws EmptyDeckException, IllegalStateOperationException
      Draws a resource card directly from the resourceDeck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - if the deck is empty.
      IllegalStateOperationException

    • play

      public void play(Point point) throws IllegalStateOperationException, IllegalPlaceCardException
      Method let the player place the selectedCard in the map
      Parameters:
      point - : coordinate of where in the map to place the card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateOperationException
      IllegalPlaceCardException
